content: this beanie was designed for a sweet friend photographer she wanted the vertical stripe look that a real pumpkin has and the pumpkin spice beanie was born skills required - knitting in the round k2tog vvd knit purl materials required worsted weight size 4 yarn size 8 5mm double pointed needles or circular for magic loop method yarn needle sizes in your pattern purchase newborn infant sitter toddler child permission is granted to sell finished product download this free pattern here 1 model images provided by my sweet friend over at www biancahubblephotography com 1 https //amandammorse com/free-knitting-pattern-pumpkin-spice-beanie/
